simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This will allocate space for a bare variable. This routine should only be called by type factories when implementing the createVar helper.

parameterdescription.para: Type object from which to create an object instance
Size of extra property slots to reserve. This is used for dynamic objects.

simplesect.para: A newly allocated variable of the requested type. Caller must not free as the GC will manage the lifecycle of the variable.

briefdescription.para: Cast a variable to a new type.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Cast a variable and return a new variable of the required type.
A newly allocated variable of the requested type. Caller must not free as the GC will manage the lifecycle of the variable.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Copy a variable and create a new copy. This may do a shallow or deep copy. A shallow copy will not copy the property instances, rather it will only duplicate the property reference. A deep copy will recursively clone all the properties of the variable.

parameterdescription.para: Set to true to do a deep copy.

simplesect.para: A newly allocated variable of the requested type. Caller must not free as the GC will manage the lifecycle of the variable.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Copy an object create a new instance. This may do a shallow or deep copy depending on the value of deep. A shallow copy will not copy the property instances, rather it will only duplicate the property reference. A deep copy will recursively clone all the properties of the variable.

parameterdescription.para: Set to true to do a deep copy.

simplesect.para: A newly allocated object. Caller must not free as the GC will manage the lifecycle of the variable.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a variable of the required type. This invokes the createVar helper method for the specified type.

parameterdescription.para: Size of extra property slots to reserve. This is used for dynamic objects.

simplesect.para: A newly allocated variable of the requested type. Caller must not free as the GC will manage the lifecycle of the variable.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a new variable instance and invoke any required constructors with the given arguments.

parameterdescription.para: Type from which to create a new instance
Vector of arguments. Each arg is an EjsObj.

simplesect.para: A newly allocated variable of the requested type. Caller must not free as the GC will manage the lifecycle of the variable.

briefdescription.para: Create an object instance of the specified type.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a new object using the specified type as a base class. Note: the constructor is not called. If you require the constructor to be invoked, use ejsCreateInstance

parameterdescription.para: Base type to use when creating the object instance
Number of extra slots to allocate when creating the object

simplesect.para: A new object instance

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Create a simple object using Object as its base type.
A new object instance

memberdef.argsstring: (Ejs *ejs, EjsObj *vp, int slotNum, EjsName *qname, struct EjsType *type, int64 attributes, EjsObj *value)
memberdef.name: ejsDefineProperty

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Define a property in a variable and give it a name, base type, attributes and default value.

parameterdescription.para: Variable in which to define a property
Slot number in the variable for the property. Slots are numbered sequentially from zero. Set to -1 to request the next available slot number.
Qualified name containing a name and a namespace.
Base type of the property. Set to ejs->voidType to leave as untyped.

Attribute traits. Useful attributes include:
EJS_FUN_OVERRIDE
EJS_ATTR_CONST
EJS_ATTR_ENUMERABLE

simplesect.para: A postitive slot number or a negative MPR error code.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Delete a variable's property and set its slot to null. The slot is not reclaimed and subsequent properties are not compacted.

parameterdescription.para: Variable in which to delete the property
Slot number in the variable for the property to delete.

simplesect.para: Zero if successful, otherwise a negative MPR error code.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Delete a variable's property by name and set its slot to null. The property is resolved by using ejsLookupProperty with the specified name. Once deleted, the slot is not reclaimed and subsequent properties are not compacted.

parameterdescription.para: Variable in which to delete the property
Qualified name for the property including name and namespace.

simplesect.para: Zero if successful, otherwise a negative MPR error code.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Destroy a variable of the required type. This invokes the destroyVar helper method for the specified type. The default action for the destroyVar helper is to simply invoke ejsFreeObj which will return the variable storage to a type pool or return the memory to the heap.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This should typically only be called by the destroyVar type helper which is invoked by the GC when a variable is no longer needed. It should not be called by normal code.

parameterdescription.para: Optional pool id. Set to -1 for defaults.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get a property from a variable at a given slot.

parameterdescription.para: Slot number for the requested property.

simplesect.para: The variable property stored at the nominated slot.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get a property from a variable by name.

parameterdescription.para: Qualified name specifying both a namespace and name.

simplesect.para: The variable property stored at the nominated slot.

briefdescription.para: Get a count of properties in a variable.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get a property from a variable at a given slot.
A positive integer count of the properties stored by the variable.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get a property name for the property at a given slot in the variable.

parameterdescription.para: Slot number for the requested property.

simplesect.para: The qualified property name including namespace and name. Caller must not free.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get a property's trait description. The property traits define the properties base type, and access attributes.

parameterdescription.para: Slot number for the requested property.

simplesect.para: A trait structure reference for the property.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Get the base type for a variable
A reference to the variables type object

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Grow the property storage for an object. Object properties are stored in slots. To store more properties, you need to grow the slots.

parameterdescription.para: New minimum count of properties. If size is less than the current number of properties, the call will be ignored, i.e. it will not shrink objects.

simplesect.para: Zero if successful

briefdescription.para: Invoke an opcode on a native type.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Invoke an Ejscript byte code operator on the specified variable given the expression right hand side. Native types would normally implement the invokeOperator helper function to respond to this function call.

parameterdescription.para: Expression right hand side for binary expression op codes. May be null for other op codes.

simplesect.para: The result of the op code or NULL if the opcode does not require a result.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Search for a property by name in the given variable.

parameterdescription.para: Qualified name of the property to search for.

simplesect.para: The slot number containing the property. Then use ejsGetProperty to retrieve the property or alternatively use ejsGetPropertyByName to lookup and retrieve in one step.

briefdescription.para: Mark a variable as currently in use.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Mark a variables as currently active so the garbage collector will preserve it. This routine should be called by native types in their markVar helper.

parameterdescription.para: Variable to mark as currently being used.

briefdescription.para: Mark an object as currently in use.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Mark an object as currently active so the garbage collector will preserve it. This routine should be called by native types that extend EjsObj in their markVar helper.

parameterdescription.para: Object to mark as currently being used.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Set a value for a property at a given slot in the specified variable.

parameterdescription.para: Slot number for the requested property.
Reference to a value to store.

simplesect.para: The slot number of the property updated.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Set a value for a property. The property is located by name in the specified variable.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to a value to store.

simplesect.para: The slot number of the property updated.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Set a qualified name for a property at the specified slot in the variable. The qualified name consists of a namespace and name - both of which must be persistent. A typical paradigm is for these name strings to be owned by the memory context of the variable.

parameterdescription.para: Slot number of the property in the variable.

simplesect.para: The slot number of the property updated.

memberdef.argsstring: (Ejs *ejs, EjsObj *vp, int slotNum, struct EjsType *type, int attributes)
memberdef.name: ejsSetPropertyTrait

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Set the traits describing a property. These include the property's base type and access attributes.

parameterdescription.para: Slot number of the property in the variable.
Base type for the property. Set to NULL for an untyped property.

simplesect.para: The slot number of the property updated.

briefdescription.para: Convert a variable to a string in JSON format.

parameterdescription.para: Options object. See serialize for details.

simplesect.para: A string object

briefdescription.para: Cast a variable to a string.

simplesect.para: A string object

detaileddescription.para:
Base type for all objects. Description:
The EjsObj type is the foundation for all types, blocks, functions and scripted classes. It provides storage and hashed lookup for properties.
EjsObj stores properties in an array of slots. These slots store a reference to the property value. Property names are stored in a names hash. Dynamic objects own their own name hash. Sealed object instances of a type, will simply refer to the hash of names owned by the type.
EjsObjs may be either dynamic or sealed. Dynamic objects can grow the number of properties. Sealed objects cannot. Sealed objects will store the slot array as part of the EjsObj memory chunk. Dynamic objects will perform a separate allocation for the slot array so that it can grow. API Stability:
Evolving.
EjsObj ejsIsObject ejsCreateSimpleObject ejsCreateObject ejsCloneObject ejsGrowObject ejsMarkObject TODO - change these From Var ejsGetVarType ejsAllocObj ejsFreeObj ejsCast ejsClone ejsCreateInstance ejsCreateVar ejsDestroyVar ejsDefineProperty ejsDeleteProperty ejsDeletePropertyByName ejsGetProperty ejsLookupProperty ejsSetProperty ejsSetPropertyByName ejsSetPropertyName ejsSetPropertyTrait ejsDeserialize ejsParseVar
